meanings.sent1: The unspoken agreement between them was to always be honest.
meanings.sent2: Her unspoken feelings for him were evident in her actions.
meanings.sent3: The unspoken rule of the house was to take off your shoes at the door.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was palpable, an unspoken barrier between them.
meanings.sent5: The unspoken truth hung heavy in the air, waiting to be acknowledged.

meanings.sent1: The unspoken request for help was clear in her eyes.
meanings.sent2: His unspoken apology was understood through his actions.
meanings.sent3: The unspoken question lingered in the room, waiting for an answer.
meanings.sent4: Their unspoken agreement to disagree kept the peace in the office.
meanings.sent5: The unspoken tension between them was finally addressed in the meeting.

meanings.definition: Understood without needing to be spoken
meanings.sent1: Their unspoken bond was evident in the way they looked out for each other.
meanings.sent2: The unspoken understanding between them made communication effortless.
meanings.sent3: The unspoken promise to always be there for each other was silently made.
meanings.sent4: In the silence, their unspoken connection spoke volumes.
meanings.sent5: Their unspoken agreement to support each other was unwavering.
